SELECT mi.id, mi.send_user AS sendUser, mi.take_user AS takeUser, mi.content, mi.create_date AS createDate, ui1.user_name AS sendUserName, ui1.avatar AS sendUserAvatar, ui2.user_name AS takeUserName, ui2.avatar AS takeUserAvatar FROM message_info mi LEFT JOIN user_info ui1 ON ( ui1.id = mi.send_user ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui2 ON ( ui2.id = mi.take_user ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui1.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.sendUserName},'%')
AND ui2.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.takeUserName},'%')
ORDER BY mi.create_date DESC

SELECT mi.send_user AS sendUser, mi.take_user AS takeUser, mi.content, mi.create_date AS createDate, ui1.user_name AS sendUserName, ui1.avatar AS sendUserAvatar, ui2.user_name AS takeUserName, ui2.avatar AS takeUserAvatar FROM ( SELECT * FROM message_info WHERE create_date IN ( SELECT MAX( create_date ) FROM message_info WHERE take_user = #{ userId } OR send_user = #{ userId } GROUP BY CONCAT( IF ( send_user > take_user, send_user, take_user ), IF ( send_user < take_user, send_user, take_user )) ) ORDER BY create_date DESC ) mi LEFT JOIN user_info ui1 ON ( ui1.id = mi.send_user ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui2 ON ( ui2.id = mi.take_user ) ORDER BY mi.create_date DESC

SELECT mi.task_status AS takeStatus, mi.send_user AS sendUser, mi.take_user AS takeUser, mi.content, mi.create_date AS createDate, ui1.user_name AS sendUserName, ui1.avatar AS sendUserAvatar, ui2.user_name AS takeUserName, ui2.avatar AS takeUserAvatar FROM ( SELECT * FROM message_info WHERE send_user = #{ sendUser } AND take_user = #{ takeUser } UNION SELECT * FROM message_info WHERE send_user = #{ takeUser } AND take_user = #{ sendUser } ) mi LEFT JOIN user_info ui1 ON ( ui1.id = mi.send_user ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui2 ON ( ui2.id = mi.take_user ) ORDER BY mi.create_date ASC
